Text:
There is missing content between files 128.mp3 and 129.mp3

The entire beginning of Book III: Chapter 7 is missing.

128.mp3 ends: "don't tremble so. I have saved him."

129.mp3 begins: "Mr. Cruncher, with some difference, explained himself as meaning 'Old Nick's'."

Missing first 12 paragraphs of Chapter 7!

sehnt, if you still check this torrent - please make the missing file available (128b.mp3) somwhere on the web (rapidshare, etc).

Actually, track 129.mp3 begins: "Mr. Cruncher, in an access of loyalty, growlingly repeated the words after Miss Pross, like somebody at church."

This means the first 20 paragraphs of Book III: Chapter 7 are missing.

Other than this, the rip is great quality. I am turning this into an audiobook with chapter art, so if I can complete the audio, I will reseed the full audiobook as an .m4b file with chapters and chapter art, etc.
